revision.text:
{{tocright}} ==Models== ===[[ASUS WUSB25E2]]=== :''Super WiMAX Mobile USB 2.0 Dongle'' • [https://www.wireless-driver.com/asus-wusb25e2-wimax-overview-specs/ Spec.] :WiMAX standard: 802.16e, USB 2.0 interface :Unknown USB ID, Used by Yota
*[[ASUS WEXP25E2]] - WiMAX Mobile Express Card • [https://www.wireless-driver.com/asus-wexp25e2-wimax-card-overview/ Spec.] :WiMAX standard: 802.16e, ExpressCard/34 interface {{See also|ASUS WMVN25E2+}}
===C-motech U300=== *USB ID(s): 0409:005a (hub), 16d8:6002 (serial) + (after modeswitch) 198f:0210 (WiMAX) *FCC ID: TARCMU-300 *[[Beceem]] BCS200 chipset (BCSB200 + BCSR200) for WiMAX *[[Qualcomm]] MSM6801 for CDMA :[[File:C-motech U300.jpg|border|100px]] *WiMAX OUI: 00:1A:20
===C-motech U301=== *USB ID(s): 1a40:0101 (hub), 16d8:6008 (serial) + (after modeswitch) 198f:0220 (WiMAX) *FCC ID: TARCMU-301 *Beceem BCSM250 chip for WiMAX *Qualcomm QSC6085 for CDMA
===Franklin U600=== *Unknown USB ID(s) *FCC ID: XHG-U600 *Beceem BCSM250 chip for WiMAX *Qualcomm QSC6085 for CDMA
===Gemtek WIXUBB-104=== *[http://www.wimaxforum.org/certification/products/bcsm250-usb-dongle-ux250 BCSM250] *Unknown USB ID *Beceem BCSM250 chip
===Gemtek WIXUBB-110 / Alvarion USB250=== *Unknown USB ID *FCC ID: MXF-WIXUBB-110 *Beceem chip
===Mitsumi WMX-U01, WMX-U02, WMX-U03=== :[http://www.wimaxforum.org/sites/wimaxforum.org/files/certification_certificates/mitsumi_mwm_w301_certification_certificate_469.pdf (various others)] *Unknown USB ID *Sequans SQN1130 chip
===Motorola USBw 25100 (USBw 100)=== *USB ID: 198f:0210 *FCC ID: VYO-USBW25100 *Beceem BCS200 chipset (BCSB200 + BCSR200) *Rebadged Quanta WU211 (FCC ID: T5U-WU211) :[[File:Motorola USBw 100.jpg|border|100px]] *WiMAX OUIs: 00:23:74, 00:23:ED
===Motorola USBw 25200 (USBw 200)=== *Unknown USB ID *FCC ID: VYO-USBW25200 *Beceem BCSM250 chip
===Quanta WU202=== *Unknown USB ID *FCC ID: T5U-WU202 *Sequans SQN1130 chip + Maxim MAX2839 chip
===Samsung SWC-U200=== *USB ID: 04e9:6761 *FCC ID: A3LSWCU200 *Samsung CMC-730 chipset *Used by Yota *Linux support, see [http://code.google.com/p/madwimax madwimax]
===Seowon SWU-3220A=== :[http://groups.google.com/group/madwimax-dev/browse_thread/thread/be0ac2eae1c32899 madwimax], [http://www.linux.org.ru/forum/linux-hardware/5646257?lastmod=1291583142044 GPL violations] *Unknown USB ID *GCT GDM7213s chip *Used by Comstar
===Sierra Wireless AirCard 250U=== *USB ID: 0424:2512 (hub), 1199:0301 (serial) + 198f:0220 (WiMAX) *FCC ID: N7NAC250U *Beceem BCSM250 chip for WiMAX *Qualcomm QSC6085 for CDMA *WiMAX OUI: 00:A0:D5
===Ubee PXU1900=== :PXU1900R (refurbished) *USB ID: 0489:e016 *FCC ID: XCNPXU1900 *Beceem BCSM250 chip
===Yota Jingle=== *USB ID: 198f:0220 *Beceem BCSM250 chip
===ZTE TU25=== *USB ID: 19d2:0007 *FCC ID: Q78-ZTE-TU25 *Beceem BCS200 chipset (BCSB200+BCSR200) :[[File:ZTE TU25.jpg|border|100px]]
===See also=== : [https://web.archive.org/web/20170615171306/http://www.hub.ru:80/wiki/Поддерживаемые_3G/CDMA_модемы 3G/4G/CDMA/WiMAX Modems] (web.archive.org) : [https://github.com/kallisti5/usb_beceemwmx/wiki/Known-beceem-devices Known Beceem devices] (?)
*ASUS WUSB25E2 - WiMAX Mobile USB Dongle • [http://wireless-drivers.blogspot.com/2011/12/asus-wusb25e2-super-wimax-mobile-usb.html spec.] :Samsung SWC-U200 :Seowon SWU1100 :Huawei BM325 :Motorola USBw 100 (GPS) *ASUS WEXP25E2 - WiMAX Express Card :Samsung SWC-E100 *[[ASUS WMVN25E2+]] - Mobile WiMAX/Wi-Fi Center :WM25E1+, WMV25E2+, WMVN25E2+ *[[AWB RG300]] *[[AT&T Elevate 4G Mobile Hotspot]] *[[CradlePoint PHS2000W]] *[[CLEAR Spot Voyager]] *[[CLEAR Modem with Wi-Fi (WIXFBR-117)]] *[[FreedomPop Freedom Hub Burst]] *[[Greenpacket DX-250]] *[[Motorola CPEi25725 (Clear)]] *[[Sprint Overdrive 3G/4G Mobile Hotspot]] *[[Sprint Overdrive Pro 3G/4G Mobile Hotspot]] *[[T-Mobile Sonic 4G Mobile Hotspot]]
